item.title: CLT and some Simulation in R
item.description: library(reshape2) library(tidyverse) library(boot) library(knitr) data <- tips summary(data) ## total_bill tip sex smoker day time ## Min. : 3.07 Min. : 1.000 Female: 87 No :151 Fri :19 Dinner:176 ## 1st Qu.:13.35 1st Qu.: 2.000 Male :157 Yes: 93 Sat :87 Lunch : 68 ## Median :17.80 Median : 2.900 Sun :76 ## Mean :19.79 Mean : 2.998 Thur:62 ## 3rd Qu.:24.13 3rd Qu.: 3.562 ## Max. :50.81 Max. :10.000 ## size ## Min.
